Html:
I am using the build - "oxite-32223\branches\tobint\auth". It throws an exception when I try to add or edit an area.

Am I using the wrong project?

I believe area management is broken across all branches at the moment.  After we finish up plugins over the next few days we'll be moving back to focusing on the rest of the admin.  We're in the middle of rebuilding it to be more feature complete.  Keep watching.
